name: Reel Rollin'
description:
Reel Rollin' takes the theme of 'Roll of the Dice' and puts the power in your hands.  In this endless runner, you must move across three reels, dodge obstacles, and make sure to roll your die to match the required number. 

Controls:

W/D - Move Up & Down the Reels

Space - Jump

Up Arrow/Down Arrow - Spin the Die Along the X-Axis

Left Arrow/Right Arrow - Spin the Die Along the Y-Axis

Notes:

WebGL version has some texture blurring.  If that is too bothersome, the Windows build looks better.
